search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'dd > h1 > a');}
search.cover: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'dt > a > img@attr->src')+'@header->Referer:'+jsoup(text,'dd > h1 > a@attr->href');}

detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.ar_list_coc > dl > dd > ul > li:nth-child(2) > a');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.ar_list_coc > dl > dd > ul > li:nth-child(3) > a')+'·'+jsoup(html,'div.ar_list_coc > dl > dd > ul > li:nth-child(5)');}

comic.list: function Main(html){eval(strmiddle(html,'<script type="text/javascript">','</script>'));var msg2 = msg.split('|');var arr = [];for (var i = 0 ; i<msg2.length; i++){arr.push('https://picsh.77dm.top/h'+img_s+'/'+msg2[i]+'.webp');};return arr;};
